message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.NE, cs.CV. 

The paper proposes a method to incorporate reference data into Neural Machine Translation (NMT) decoding. This falls under the category of Natural Language Processing (NLP), which is usually classified under cs.CL. The proposed method involves using Local Coordinates Coding (LCC) to obtain global context vectors, which is a technique used in machine learning and falls under the categories of cs.AI, cs.LG, and cs.NE. The paper also mentions using image captioning as an example, which involves computer vision and falls under cs.CV. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CL, followed by cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.NE, and cs.CV.
